statements: SELECT * FROM iot_devices WHERE id = 1;
SELECT serial_number, stock_level FROM iot_devices WHERE stock_level > 50;
SELECT id, serial_number, stock_level FROM iot_devices WHERE specifications->>'weight' >= '2';
SELECT * FROM iot_devices ORDER BY stock_level ASC;
SELECT id, specifications->>'size' AS size FROM iot_devices WHERE stock_level < 10;
SELECT * FROM iot_devices WHERE stock_level > 50 ORDER BY serial_number DESC
SELECT id, serial_number, specifications->>'brand' AS brand FROM iot_devices WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM iot_devices WHERE stock_level BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY id
SELECT id, serial_number, specifications->>'color' AS color FROM iot_devices WHERE specifications->'color' = 'blue'
SELECT id, serial_number, stock_level FROM iot_devices WHERE stock_level < 10 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT device_name, specs FROM devices WHERE stock_level > 0;
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE device_id = 3;
SELECT device_name, serial_number FROM devices WHERE stock_level < 10 ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT location_name, device_name FROM locations JOIN devices ON locations.device_id = devices.device_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_devices FROM devices;
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, stock_level FROM devices WHERE stock_level > 10 ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_id, location_name FROM devices JOIN locations ON devices.device_id = locations.device_id;
SELECT location_name FROM locations WHERE location_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND device_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(location_id) AS location_count FROM locations GROUP BY device_id HAVING location_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM stock_levels;
SELECT device_name, current_quantity FROM stock_levels ORDER BY current_quantity DESC;
SELECT device_name, last_updated FROM stock_levels WHERE current_quantity > 10;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(serial_number) AS serial_number_count FROM serial_numbers GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT device_id, specification_name, specification_value FROM device_specifications WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM stock_levels WHERE current_quantity > 0 ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT device_name, current_quantity FROM stock_levels WHERE last_updated > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY current_quantity DESC;

SELECT sl.device_name, sn.serial_number, ds.specification_name FROM stock_levels sl INNER JOIN serial_numbers sn ON sl.id = sn.device_id INNER JOIN device_specifications ds ON sl.id = ds.device_id WHERE ds.specification_name LIKE '%color%' AND sn.is_active = true;

SELECT sl.device_name, sl.current_quantity, sn.serial_number, ds.specification_value FROM stock_levels sl LEFT JOIN serial_numbers sn ON sl.id = sn.device_id RIGHT JOIN device_specifications ds ON ds.device_id = sl.id WHERE sl.current_quantity < 10 AND ds.specification_name = 'weight';

SELECT sl.device_name AS 'Device Name', sn.serial_number AS 'Serial Number', ds.specification_name AS 'Spec Name', ds.specification_value AS 'Spec Value' FROM stock_levels sl JOIN serial_numbers sn ON sl.id = sn.device_id JOIN device_specifications ds ON sl.id = ds.device_id WHERE sl.current_quantity >= 5;
SELECT * FROM stock_levels ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT device_name, weight, dimensions FROM device_specifications WHERE device_id = 3;
SELECT serial_number, device_id FROM serial_numbers WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT device_id, location_name FROM device_locations ORDER BY location_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM stock_levels WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01' AND stock_quantity > 100;
SELECT device_id, stock_quantity, last_updated FROM stock_levels ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM serial_numbers WHERE is_active = true AND manufacturing_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_id, device_name, weight FROM device_specifications WHERE weight > 2.5;
SELECT device_id, location_id, location_name FROM device_locations WHERE location_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY location_id ASC;
SELECT s.serial_number, s.device_id, d.device_name, d.weight FROM serial_numbers s JOIN device_specifications d ON s.device_id = d.device_id;
SELECT * FROM stock_levels ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT device_id, stock_quantity FROM stock_levels WHERE stock_quantity > 0;
SELECT device_id, model_name, manufacturer FROM device_specifications WHERE manufacturer = 'Samsung';
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100;
SELECT serial_number, is_available FROM serial_numbers WHERE is_available = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM stock_levels WHERE stock_quantity > 10 ORDER BY last_updated DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT device_id, model_name, manufacturer FROM device_specifications WHERE manufacturer = 'Apple';
SELECT serial_number, is_available FROM serial_numbers WHERE is_available = TRUE AND device_id = 3;
SELECT device_id, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE location_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY latitude, longitude DESC;
SELECT log_id, device_id, log_timestamp FROM device_logs WHERE log_message LIKE '%error%' ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
